CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "CR Lost"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Unqualified"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Lost") ), "ðŸŸ¢ Lost/Unqualified", IF( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Qualified"), "ðŸŸ¢ Qualified", IF( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) < 10, "ðŸŸ¢ on time", IF( AND( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 10, (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) <= 20 ), "ðŸŸ over 10d", IF( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 21, "ðŸ”´ 21d", IF( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) > 21, "over 21d", "" ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Days Since Creation
